jobContext:
Creating seasonal collections from Idea generation to TechPack making, material selection as per international market demand.
Keeping up to date with emerging fashion trends and general trends relating to fabrics, colors, and silhouettes.
Planning and developing ranges within the time frame.
Creating trend tech packs and mood boards for own collection
Working with others in the team to develop products.
Understanding design from a technical perspective, i.e. producing patterns and technical specifications for designs
Sourcing, selecting, and buying fabrics, trims, fastenings and embellishments.
Negotiating with customers and suppliers
Any other responsibilities assigned by the management.
Must be proficient in CLO 3D
jobDescription: Creating seasonal collections from Idea generation to TechPack making, material selection as per international market demand.
educationalReq: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Fashion Design  Technology, Bachelor of Arts (BA)

jobContext:
Collaborate closely with the Product Development Manager to execute the entire product development process, ensuring timelines and quality standards are met under the Manager's guidance.
Work hand in hand with the design teams to bring innovative and marketable product concepts to life, aligning with customer needs and brand strategy.
Conduct thorough market research to identify emerging trends and consumer preferences, translating these insights into innovative and competitive product offerings.
Engage collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including design, sourcing, merchandising, and marketing, to ensure a unified product vision and successful execution.
Oversee critical tasks such as product testing, sample review, and quality assurance, ensuring products align with internal standards and regulatory requirements.
Assist in managing and mentoring a team of product developers, offering guidance and support to foster their professional growth and development.
Participate in competitive analysis and benchmarking activities to remain updated on industry trends and pinpoint opportunities for enhancement.
Establish and cultivate robust relationships with suppliers and vendors, guaranteeing adherence to quality standards and technical specifications.
Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams to infuse sustainability principles into the product design and development process.
Contribute to impactful product presentations to key stakeholders.
Stay attuned to market trends, innovative advancements, and dynamic market dynamics that may influence product strategies.
Demonstrate ability to meet deadlines and adhere to timelines within budgetary constraints.
jobDescription: Collaborate closely with the Product Development Manager to execute the entire product development process, ensuring timelines and quality standards are met under the Manager's guidance.
educationalReq: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Fashion Design  Technology, Bachelor of Arts (BA)

jobContext:
Candle Animation Studios is a cartoon production startup in growth! We are an independent animation studio with world class animation studio equipment. In Candle, we produce animated cartoon series and movies for kids and children. We have a vision of introducing new technologies to the Bangladeshi media industry and interrupt the traditional work methods. Do you want to be a part of that? We seek some unpaid interns who can help us with it.
Our last batch of unpaid interns have Successfully joined Candle Animation Studios as a regular employee. So, we seek some more new unpaid interns to further increase our workforce.
Please don`t waste time. Apply Now. Be an intern, work hard and get your job as a professional animator.
If we believe you have a fitting profile for what we are looking for you will be called for a job interview.
We offer a 3 month long internship. After completion of internship, we will offer permanent position to the interns.
jobDescription: Candle Animation Studios is a cartoon production startup in growth! We are an independent animation studio with world class animation studio equipment. In Candle, we produce animated cartoon series and movies for kids and children. We have a vision of introducing new technologies to the Bangladeshi media industry and interrupt the traditional work methods. Do you want to be a part of that? We seek some unpaid interns who can help us with it.
educationalReq: Bachelor degree in any discipline

jobContext:
ORENDT STUDIOS is looking for an  Project Manager to scale the team in Dhaka.
You will be leading and organizing the jobs / projects for the teams in Dhaka.
The projects are 3D / CGI jobs and will be focusing on photorealistic digital product visualization, like furniture, household products, etc.
You will get the projects from your German colleagues, and you provide the information to the Dhaka team, brief them and check if the work is on time and as per the expected quality.
jobDescription: ORENDT STUDIOS is looking for an  Project Manager to scale the team in Dhaka.
educationalReq: At least 2 year(s)
additionalReq: Knowledge about 3D media projects and processes

jobContext:
Caritas Bangladesh (CB) is a national and non-profit development organization operating in Bangladesh 
since 1967. It has its Central Office in Dhaka and eight Regional Offices (Barishal, Chattogram, Dhaka, 
Dinajpur, Khulna, Mymensingh, Rajshahi and Sylhet Region). CB is implementing 89 on-going projects 
covering 189 Upazilas focusing on six main priorities i.e i) Social Welfare for Vulnerable Communities 
(SWVC), ii) Education and Child Development, iii) Nutrition and Health Education, iv) Disaster 
Management, v) Ecological Conservation and Food Security (ECFS), and vi) Development of Indigenous 
Peoples. 
Caritas Bangladesh (CB), Ukhiya Upazila Office, Cox`s Bazar is looking for suitable candidates for an 
immediate appointment as well as to prepare a panel list for Emergency Response to the Forcibly 
Displaced People of Myanmar in Bangladesh.
The details of the position including job responsibilities, educational qualification and other qualities
/competency required for the above position are given below for your information.
Job Nature : Temporary
jobDescription: Caritas Bangladesh (CB) is a national and non-profit development organization operating in Bangladesh
educationalReq: Bachelor's degree in Theatre/Music/social science/Psychology/English or any relevant subject from a government-recognized university in Bangladesh.
additionalReq: Minimum 6 months of work experience in Protection/MHPSS/GBV/Child protection/Theatre activity in an emergency context.

jobContext:
ORENDT STUDIOS is looking for a 3DS Max Artist to scale the team in Dhaka.
The work is focusing on photorealistic product visualization, like furniture, household products - either as a product shot or in an environment.
Our main software pipeline is 3DS Max & Vray. Therefore, you should have a deep understanding of the software and high-quality visualization of products.
You have the opportunity to collaborate with our international team in a nice and friendly working environment.
jobDescription: ORENDT STUDIOS is looking for a 3DS Max Artist to scale the team in Dhaka.
additionalReq: Knowledge about 3D media projects and several years of experience as a 3DS Max Senior Artist
